pages.about-us: ScentHaven - Passion for Luxury Fragrances ScentHaven HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Indulge Your Senses with ScentHaven At ScentHaven, we are dedicated to curating an exquisite range of fragrances that evoke emotions and memories. Our passion lies in helping you discover scents that resonate with your personality and enhance every moment of your life. From captivating perfumes to luxurious colognes, we meticulously select each fragrance to ensure a sensory journey like no other. Let ScentHaven elevate your senses and create unforgettable experiences through the power of scent. WHY CHOOSE SCENTHAVEN Elevate Your Senses with ScentHaven Indulge in the world of luxury fragrances with ScentHaven's exclusive collection. Exquisite Scents Explore a curated selection of perfumes and colognes featuring exquisite scents that captivate the senses. Discover What Our Customers are Saying About ScentHaven "ScentHaven has elevated my daily routine with their captivating fragrances. Each scent tells a unique story and leaves a lasting impression. The quality of their perfumes is unmatched, and their commitment to customer satisfaction is commendable. I'm delighted with my experience and highly recommend ScentHaven to all fragrance enthusiasts." pages.disclaimers: ScentHaven - Disclaimers, Terms of Use, and Legal Policies ScentHaven HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Disclaimers ScentHaven strives to provide the highest quality products and information, but please be aware of the following disclaimers: **Product Safety:** Always test scented products on a small area of skin before full use. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep all products out of reach of children and pets. **Medical Advice:** The information on this website is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. **Product Efficacy:** While we strive to provide accurate information about the potential benefits of our products, individual results may vary. We cannot guarantee specific outcomes. **Accuracy of Information:** ScentHaven makes every effort to ensure the accuracy of the information on this website. However, we cannot be held responsible for any errors or omissions. By using this website, you agree to these disclaimers. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. pages.privacy-policy: ScentHaven - Privacy Policy ScentHaven HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy ScentHaven is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our website ("Service"). Information We Collect We collect two types of information on the Service: **Personal Information:** This includes information that can be used to identify you, such as your name, email address, and billing information. You provide this information to us when you create an account, place an order, or subscribe to our newsletter. **Non-Personal Information:** This includes information that cannot be used to identify you, such as your browser type, operating system, IP address, browsing activity, and demographic information. We collect this information automatically when you use the Service. How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to: Process your orders and provide you with the Service. Send you marketing communications, such as newsletters and promotional offers. Respond to your inquiries and requests. Improve the Service and our offerings. We use your non-personal information to: Administer the Service and diagnose technical problems. Analyze trends and usage patterns. Improve the functionality and usability of the Service. Disclosure of Your Information We may disclose your information to third-party service providers who help us operate the Service and deliver our offerings. These service providers are contractually obligated to keep your information confidential and to use it only for the purposes for which it has been disclosed. We may also disclose your information if we are required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such disclosure is necessary to comply with a court order, subpoena, or other legal process, or to protect the rights, property, or safety of us or others. Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Your Choices You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. Security We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website or internet transmission is completely secure. We cannot guarantee the security of your information. Children's Privacy Our Service is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete the information from our servers. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. ScentHaven website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: ScentHaven - Terms and Conditions ScentHaven HOME ABOUT US Products Contact ScentHaven Terms and Conditions Welcome to ScentHaven! These terms and conditions ("Terms") outline the rules and regulations for using our website (the "Service") operated by ScentHaven ("us", "we", or "our"). Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Service. Your Accounts If you create an account on the Service, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. Intellectual Property The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of ScentHaven and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws of both the United States and foreign countries. Links To Other Sites Our Service may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by ScentHaven. ScentHaven has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. We encourage you to be aware of when you leave our Service and to read the terms and conditions and privacy policy of any other website or service that you visit. Termination We may terminate or suspend your access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms. Disclaimer Your use of the Service is at your sole risk. The Service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. ScentHaven makes no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding the availability, accuracy, reliability, usability, or content of the Service. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Azerbaijan, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Changes to These Terms We may update our Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page. You are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. Your continued use of the Service after we post revisions to these Terms means you accept and agree to the changes.
